sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT FUEL_CD ,FUEL_NM ,ENERGY_UNIT ,ENERGY_TOTAL_CAL_VAL ,ENERGY_NET_CAL_VAL ,GR_HSE_UNIT ,GR_HSE_COEF ,MNG_YEAR FROM ENERGY_USAGEQY_COEF_F WHERE 1=1
AND MNG_YEAR = #sMngYear#
AND FUEL_CD LIKE '%' || #sFuelCd# || '%'
AND FUEL_NM LIKE '%' || #sFuelNm# || '%'
ORDER BY FUEL_CD ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ENERGY_USAGEQY_COEF_F WHERE 1=1
AND MNG_YEAR = #sMngYear#
AND FUEL_CD LIKE '%' || #sFuelCd# || '%'
AND FUEL_NM LIKE '%' || #sFuelNm# || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) yearcnt FROM ENERGY_USAGEQY_COEF_F WHERE MNG_YEAR = #sMngYear#

SELECT /*+ INDEX (T2 PK_ENERGY_USAGEQY_COEF_F) */ T1.MNG_YEAR ,NVL(MIN(T2.GR_HSE_COEF),0) AS GR_HSE_COEF FROM ( SELECT #fuelCd# AS FUEL_CD ,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,(LEVEL-1)*(-12)),'YYYY') AS MNG_YEAR FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 10 ) T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ENERGY_USAGEQY_COEF_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_YEAR=T2.MNG_YEAR AND T1.FUEL_CD=T2.FUEL_CD) GROUP BY T1.MNG_YEAR ORDER BY T1.MNG_YEAR
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ENERGY_USAGEQY_COEF_F SET FUEL_NM = #fuelNm# ,ENERGY_UNIT = #energyUnit# ,ENERGY_TOTAL_CAL_VAL = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#energyTotalCalVal#,',','')) ,ENERGY_NET_CAL_VAL = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#energyNetCalVal#,',','')) ,GR_HSE_UNIT = #grHseUnit# ,GR_HSE_COEF = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#grHseCoef#,',','')) ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND FUEL_CD = #fuelCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE ENERGY_USAGEQY_COEF_F WHERE MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND FUEL_CD = #fuelCd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ENERGY_USAGEQY_COEF_F ( FUEL_CD ,FUEL_NM ,ENERGY_UNIT ,ENERGY_TOTAL_CAL_VAL ,ENERGY_NET_CAL_VAL ,GR_HSE_UNIT ,GR_HSE_COEF ,MNG_YEAR ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ) SELECT FUEL_CD ,FUEL_NM ,ENERGY_UNIT ,ENERGY_TOTAL_CAL_VAL ,ENERGY_NET_CAL_VAL ,GR_HSE_UNIT ,GR_HSE_COEF ,#sMngYear# ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE FROM ENERGY_USAGEQY_COEF_F WHERE MNG_YEAR = TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(#sMngYear#) - 1)
